page.title: 16RECREATION IN YALDING
page.content: Although Nettlestead has only a Cricket Club the village is adjacent to Wateringbury and villagers participate there. In Yalding clubs cater for many interests, including football, cricket, karate and squash. There is a mother and baby club, Women's Institute, Bingo Club and a Working Men's Club. The Primrose Club organises functions for older people. The Garden Society holds 3 shows each year. There is a Youth Club as well as Cubs, Brownies, Scouts and Guides. Church groups include Mothers' Union, bellringers and choir. The Weald Playgroup caters for pre-school age children. The local environmental group, Yalding & Nettlestead Protection Society, has kept open footpaths and planted trees. There is some angling. Videos may be hired.
